title: Freaks (1932 film)
summary: Freaks (also re-released as The Monster Story,[6],Forbidden Love and Natures Mistakes[7]) is a 1932 American pre-Code horror film produced and directed by Tod Browning, and originally also a vehicle for Lon Chaney[6] and starring Wallace Ford, Leila Hyams, Olga Baclanova and Roscoe Ates.
